verses.verse: I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>: before the <S%H430>gods<s%> will I sing praise unto <S%H2167>you<s%>.

I will <S%H7812>worship<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and for your <S%H571>truth<s%>: for you have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> your <S%H565>word<s%> above all your <S%H8034>name<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>cried<s%> you <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7292>me<s%>, and strengthened me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, when they <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H7891>Yes<s%>, they shall sing in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Though the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H7311>high<s%>, yet has he <S%H7200>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8217>lowly<s%>: but the <S%H1364>proud<s%> he <S%H3045>knows<s%> afar <S%H4801>off<s%>.

Though I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, you will <S%H2421>revive<s%> <S%H7971>me<s%>: you shall stretch forth your <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall save <S%H3467>me<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1584>perfect<s%> that which concerns <S%H2617>me<s%>: your mercy, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, endures for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: <S%H7503>forsake<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
